confederate_footnotes.%: Begins game on exhausted side with disorganized Strength marker. Historical Note: Manpower includes 46th Alabama.
confederate_footnotes.#: Begins game at Fatigue Level 1 on normal side. Also, is not released at start (see Special Rule 3).

confederate_footnotes.*: May not activate on Turn 1. Exception: May be eligible for “Early Release”; see Special Rule 5.
confederate_footnotes.^: May not activate on Turn 1 and starts Turn 2 at Fatigue Level 1 on normal side.

union_footnotes.#: Begins game at Fatigue Level 1 on normal side.
union_footnotes.^: Reinforcements on Turn 2; see Special Rule 6.

confederate_footnotes.*: Indicated units may not activate until Turn 3.

confederate_footnotes.#: Units may not activate (but may entrench) unless a Union unit moves adjacent, at which point that specific unit is immediately released from this restriction.
confederate_footnotes.*: On Turn 1, units may neither activate nor entrench unless a unless a Union unit moves adjacent, at which point that specific unit is immediately released

union_footnotes.^: Begins game on exhausted side at Fatigue Level 1.

confederate_footnotes.+: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 2 on their normal sides.
confederate_footnotes.*: Units may not activate until Turn 2.

union_footnotes.*: Units may not activate until Turn 2.
union_footnotes.+: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1.

confederate_footnotes.*: Units begin game on their exhausted sides.
confederate_footnotes.+: Units begin game with disorganized Strength markers.
confederate_footnotes.^: Reynolds begins game at Fatigue Level 2.

confederate_footnotes.+: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers and Demoralized-1 markers.
confederate_footnotes.*: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers.
confederate_footnotes.^: Units begin the game at Fatigue Level 0 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers.

union_footnotes.*: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers.
union_footnotes.#: Ewing may not activate until Turn 2.
union_footnotes.&: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their normal sides.

union_footnotes.*: Units begin game under Breastwork-Complete markers.
union_footnotes.+: WS Smith is placed on the map with a Fatigue Level of 1.

confederate_footnotes.*: Units may not activate on Turn 1, but may be released early (see Special Rule 3).
confederate_footnotes.+: Units may not activate on Turns 1 through 10 and may never be released early. Exception: If a Union infantry unit enters Warren County, these units are
confederate_footnotes.#: Units may not activate on Turns 1 and 2 and may never be released early.
confederate_footnotes.^: Reynolds may not activate on Turn 1, may never be released early, and starts Turn 2 at Fatigue Level 1 on its normal side.
